resources.string: Please select a mod package first
Confirm to remove all changes of BGM?

"Already installed a mod package with the same type，confirm to uninstall the one installed and continue?
Android version is lower than 5.1(Lollipop),wav transcode disabled.
Incorrect file format,it\'s NOT a wav file.

Instructions:\nthere are some music in each scene,you have to change ALL the music in this scene and the change will be effective.Mainstream music format supported.If you want to remove one of the music,press \"Remove Changes\" to delete the music you have chosen in this scene,long press to remove all the music in all scenes.
NavalCreedModhelper needs permission \"Storage\" to run normally
Incorrect file format,it\'s NOT a ogv file
Instructions:\nThere are 3 scenes :loading picture,loading picture,matching picture.\nEach scene has some pictures that you can replace,select a scene,a picture and press Apply

Instructions:
Each country has 15 to 16 pictures to change you can change only one of these pictures,doesn't need to change all，you can find the picture what you have changed in crew file
What to do:Choose what country and picture number,then choose what picture you want to change and press to change Apply
Press RemoveChange to remove the picture what you chose,press longer to remove ALL the picture in which country you chose
The current software version may not be able to implement all the functions in the mod package. Continue?
An abandoned interface was used by the mod package.You need to disable the "mod package management system" to install it if you want.
A mod package which is the same type of this package was already installed.You need to uninstall it in mod package manager to install this package.
Select the captain voice to replace
Filed to resolve actual path of the selected file.\nTake a screenshot and send it to the developer please.
Mod package management system would not work after disable it,continue?

Introduction:
Login movie can only be replaced with a following format video:
File format:ogv
Video encoder:theora
We recommend that you transcode it on a PC and then send it to your device.
Notice that the audio in the video would not be played,custom it in BGM page.
This mod package will not be able to uninstall after installed.
No enough space left on device,this mod package requires %1$d bytes.However,there\'s only %2$d bytes left on this device.
Conflict with current file detected.Do you want to continue?
This device is not suppported.\nDue to the limitation of scoped storage which is introduced sice Android 11,we can\'t get permission needed to do modifications.
Please select the \"SELECT\" button at the bottom of the screen in the next scene
